Name: Cathy the Guide
Text: Good afternoon, my guests. Welcome to Constellia's First Paradise Festival Shop-Cheering Event! I am the guide of the event, Cathy.

Name: Cathy the Guide
Text: This is a small event organized based on the records from the Golden Age with various activities that people of different ages and identities would participated in during the Golden Age.

Name: Cathy the Guide
Text: Play the three simple games in the hall to get all Cathy's ☆ Special Stamps to claim the great reward of the event. Would you like to team up?

Name: Karenina
Text: Collecting stamps? Sounds interesting. I bet Commandant wants to participate in it. So I guess I'll have to do this as well.

Name: Karenina
Text: Comm—an—dant! Where are you going?

Name: Karenina
Text: The guide is so friendly. Don't walk away like this... It's rude!

Name: Cathy the Guide
Text: You have registered successfully. The stamp cards will be sent to your terminals. Please check if they are identified as spam messages and blocked.

Name: Cathy the Guide
Text: The first game is—your favorite Brain Tease! Four wanted white cube Kuroros ran into the hall. And it's your job to catch them. Complete it in 60s to get an extra reward.

Name: Karenina
Text: Hide-and-see? Should be a piece of cake for you, right? Commandant?

Name: Cathy the Guide
Text: Congratulations! You have completed the challenge within the time limit. Now let's move on to the next game.

Name: Cathy the Guide
Text: The four Kuroros you caught have made the following confessions. Only one of them was lying. So which Kuroro is the principal criminal?

Name: Cathy the Guide
Text: Sorry, you haven't completed the challenge within the time limit. Now let's move on to the next game.

Name: Cathy the Guide
Text: The four Kuroros you caught have made the following confessions. Only one of them was lying. So which Kuroro is the principal criminal?

Name: Cathy the Guide

Name: Cathy the Guide
Text: Unfortunately, you got the wrong answer, but don't get frustrated. You have completed the game. Now please open your terminals. You will find the stamp there.

Name: Cathy the Guide
Text: Next up, the second game—your favorite Photoshoot! Please read the rules created based on the article that earned over a million clicks in the Golden Age—Share it With Your Partner: 100 Photo-Taking Tips for Couples.

Name: Karenina

Name: Cathy the Guide
Text: Please go to the designated photo position. By the way, just call me if you want to change the atmosphere in the hall. Meow.

Text: Would you like to stop the photo-shooting? For your information, the system recommends the female Construct do the Golden Age idol postures. By estimation, this will increase her teammate's affection of her by 48.9%.

Name: Karenina

Name: Cathy the Guide
Text: You've won this game! Now please open your terminals. You will find the stamp there.

Name: Cathy the Guide
Text: Next up, the third game. The most popular Monster Bash! You are required to have an exhibition match against our staff.

Name: Cathy the Guide

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Rosa...? Are you talking about the kid we saw around Asimov?

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Yes, she and Rand are the ones that bring the data back for the Plume specialized frame, if my memory serves me correctly.

Name: Lucia
Text: ...So she's Ann?

Name: Lucia
Text: So Lithos... your brother went missing. Do you remember when that was?

Name: Rose
Text: When he went to look for Professor Trout, so... about a month ago?

Name: Lucia
Text: Any idea why Lithos was trying to help this Professor Trout?

Name: Rose
Text: Professor Trout was going to adopt us, and Lithos said he wanted to repay him for that. Professor Trout is gone, though, and Lithos has to take care of the things Professor Trout didn't finish.

Name: Lucia
Text: Did Professor Trout tell you what it is that he needed you guys to do for him?

Name: Rose
Text: Uhm... I think... it's got to do with memory data.

Name: Rose
Text: Lithos told me that memory data is this thing that turns everything in the human brain into data and stores it somewhere else. Some people change their bodies using it.

Name: Rose
Text: I hope it's something that allows people to change their bodies, though. I really want to see Professor Trout alive again...

Name: Rose
Text: Yup. Lithos told me that mom and dad were researchers when they were still around. A lot of our family members are gifted when it comes to science.

Name: Rose
Text: Lithos knows more than I do, though. Our Fathers said Lithos would have been adopted a long time ago had his mother been a "good" mother and that he hadn't been born disabled.

Name: Lucia
Text: This talent... Is it what this Professor Trout is after?

Name: Rose
Text: Uhm? Professor Trout was just trying to get us out of the orphanage so we could go to school properly...

Name: Lucia
Text: Trout... memory data... and Lithos... All of this reminds me of someone in particular.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Vonnegut?

Name: Rose
Text: How do you guys know this name? I thought he only told me and Lithos this name?

Name: Rose
Text: We're all Professor Trout's friends, then, since he told you guys this name.

Name: Lucia
Text: Another question for you, Rose. Why did Lithos bring Trout's memory data all the way to Constellia?

Name: Rose
Text: I don't know, but I think he said... it's because there's a secret base here?

Name: Lucia
Text: Have you found it?

Name: Rose
Text: ...No... And Lithos isn't here, either... And I can't get out of here.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Is there anyone else here?

Name: Rose
Text: Yes, most of the people are at the art gallery. There are also mercenaries who would come and take our things every now and then.

Name: Lucia
Text: Let's head over to the art gallery, Commandant. That's where Chaos went missing, too.

Name: Lucia
Text: There's also a vending machine there. We haven't resupplied for quite some time.

Name: Lucia
Text: It's totally empty... Wait, it says here... December 31, 2060? If this date here is correct, then we're at the end of the Golden Age, which is 11 days after the Punishing Virus outbreak.

Name: Dejected Employee A
Text: Oh boy, this sure reminds me of... whatchamacallit... Right, some professor came up with something that's even more "powerful" than the Umbrella , and this thing is finally screwing the world over, yeah?

Name: Dejected Employee B
Text: This is awesome. Now we don't need to worry about doing our jobs OR losing our jobs. Would be great if we didn't need to worry about what we're having for dinner.

Name: Dejected Employee A
Text: The world can rot for all I care. Ain't no way Gestalt has enough sweet offers to go around even if the disaster containment walls open up and let us out of here.

Name: Dejected Employee B
Text: This is what we get for being in the entertainment industry. The guy on the top might be a huge fan of mechanical arts, but so far, he’s only found a handful of famous artists who meet his standards. Honestly, comparing to those machines that give more bang for the buck, I ain't surprised about being replaced.

Name: Mercenary A
Text: Yo, man, what the hell is going on? I came here thinking that we're supposed to get the protesting employees to go home, how do we get stuck here in Constellia for days?!

Name: Mercenary B
Text: This isn't some sort of reality show, right? See those red butterflies and those plaster robots that have lost their minds? They make it seem like we're in a reality show taking place at a haunted gallery.

Name: Mercenary A
Text: But... people don't die in reality shows, right? I mean, you guys aren't gonna tell me I'm the only real person here and all these dead things are machines?

Name: Mercenary C
Text: Hey, these two here... they're the "trained-staff" you were talking about?

Name: Mercenary A
Text: Holy- Get away from me. I ain't done nothing. If you're giving anyone a piece of mind, take it to your higher-ups. We're just here to get you to go home 'cause they're tired of your little protest here. We ain't here to fight you guys over instant noodles.

Name: Mercenary A
Text: If you ask me, though, I'd say they deserved what came their way. If they all had worked as hard as you guys did, ain't no way they'd have been fired, right?

Name: Rose
Text: It's dangerous over there... Let's not go over there.

Name: Lucia
Text: Getting into conflict with these ordinary people here isn't going to do us any good or get us any info. Let's take Rose back to the art gallery and look for Chaos after that.

Name: Mercenary
Text: Boss is in there trying to figure out what those weird noises are. Stay away if you don't want your heads blown off.

Name: Lucia
Text: A floating cruiser... Should we take this and check out the city from up there? I mean we could try going up with you clinging to me, but a floating cruiser seems to be the safer choice here with Rose around, in case we run into anything going up.

Name: Lucia
Text: We need an access card. Lee probably could deactivate this thing for us were he here.

Name: Lucia
Text: Chaos?!

Name: Rose
Text: That man... I've seen him before. The butterflies killed him earlier.

Name: Lucia
Text: He has an access card... Why is Chaos pointing out this place for us?

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: She's probably trying to familiarize us with this city.

Name: Lucia
Text: She's nothing more than a Hetero-Creature. Don't expect any better of her actions.

Name: Lucia
Text: This card actually works on the floating cruiser. We're good to go now.

Name: Guide
Text: Welcome to the "Golden Time Court" exhibition area, located at the North Fifth Ring of Constellia. I am going to guide you to the art gallery. Please keep an eye on your children and ensure you're seated securely.

Name: Rose
Text: ...Woah, this place is high...

Name: Guide
Text: The towering structure we're seeing is the tallest building in the "Golden Time Court", which symbolizes the radiant melody of this era and humanity's vision of sailing into the stars. Inside the tower, every floor, staircase, railing, and decorative element gives off the sound of different musical instruments when being touched, blending seamlessly into the tower's overarching symphony.

Name: Guide
Text: We have arrived at the art gallery. Please exit in an orderly fashion after the cruiser has fully stopped. We wish you a pleasant day.

Name: Lucia
Text: Are you alright, Commandant?

Name: Lucia
Text: No, I'm fine. Just thought I'd check on you.

Name: Cradle
Text: How many times have I killed you now? How many more times do I have to do this to make you stay dead?

Name: Cradle
Text: I can sense it, she wants this. So let her die in your place this time.

Name: Liv
Text: ...I'm sorry Commandant... for failing to protect you...

Name: Lee
Text: Ugh...

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Should you need it, I will help.

Name: Vonnegut
Text: At least for now, we share a common enemy.

Name: Vonnegut
Text: You should put your trust in me, even if it's only for now.

Name: Cradle
Text: Planning to step on your "comrades'" bones again to reach your next destination, Nemo?

Name: Cradle
Text: Those who trusted you are long dead, Professor Trout.

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Get your head in the game!

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Behind you.

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Chaos.

Name: Cradle
Text: ...The only one... who failed... is Cradle...

Name: Cradle
Text: You're not ready. Even if you destroy this body, Chaos will still meet the same fate as Cradle.

Name: Lucia
Text: I've grown used to pain long ago...!

Name: 3.0 Main Story After 2200
Text: 3.0 Main Story After 2200 ========== SECTION BREAK ==========

Name: The Merciful One
Text: Here they come again... annoying bugs.

Name: The Merciful One
Text: Which crack did they crawl through this time?

Name: The Merciful One
Text: This area is clear... let's go check over there.

Name: The Merciful One
Text: Ah... I thought I'd lost it, but it turns out I just left it here?
Hey, did you know▅▆▄, we intercepted▁▃▆unexpected▆▄information...
Is this some kind of joke▆▄▃▆▃...
But if ▆▄▁▃▆ is heat death ▁▃▆▄...

Name: The Merciful One
Text: Well...

Name: The Merciful One
Text: Why is it happening again... This isn't a place you can just corrupt.
May the Four-Winged ▄▁▃▆▃ White Raven protect us.
I really want to see Endymion, I heard they have the most beautiful sunsets in the whole galaxy.

Name: The Merciful One
Text: Yeah, I'd really like to see Endymion again...
I really want to see Endymion, I heard they have the most beautiful sunsets in the whole galaxy.
The last star is about to go out, we have no more chances...
The research institute says they found a new "substance"...
Apparently, it can replicate civilizations...
Could that really be the answer...

Name: The Merciful One
Text: Huh? Is this... what I lost when I was here last time?

Name: The Merciful One
Text: Four-Winged White Raven... protect us. It's been... a long time since I said that.

Name: The Merciful One
Text: Will all civilizations eventually perish?

Name: The Merciful One
Text: The rift hasn't been sealed yet... that's a problem.

Name: The Merciful One
Text: Even if it's a graveyard of civilizations, you can't just corrupt it.
Ishmael?

Name: The Merciful One
Text: The leftover memories are damaged... only the final voice remains...
Heat death? That's just a theory, it can't be real.
I'm going on vacation to the next galaxy—
Did you book the latest teleporter?

Name: The Merciful One
Text: Still no signs of life...

Name: The Merciful One
Text: The last piece, so it was here.

Name: The Merciful One
Text: Mm... brings back memories.

Name: The Merciful One
Text: Alright, it's about to end.

Name: The Merciful One
Text: Well then... until next time… my city.
Ishmael!

Name: Ishmael
Text: The leftover memories are damaged... only the final voice remains...

Name: 3.0 Luna Coating Stage After 2500
Text: 3.0 Luna Coating Stage After 2500 ========== SECTION BREAK ==========
We will follow God's will! Offer the sacrifice, and God shall save us!
Burn her! Burn this evil witch!

Name: Luna
Text: Why did they leave? No, wait...

Name: Luna
Text: This is...
Go to hell, you evil witch!

Name: Desperate Girl
Text: You drove me to this... now go to hell with me! Hahaha...

Name: Desperate Girl
Text: You're one of their accomplices... all of you must die!

Name: Luna
Text: She's lost all reason. We must fight.

Name: Desperate Girl
Text: Why... are you stopping me?

Name: Desperate Girl
Text: They're the ones who should die... They're the ones who deserve to go to hell!

Name: Luna
Text: She's completely gone crazy...

Name: Desperate Girl
Text: I can't accept this... why...

Name: Luna
Text: That's enough. It's all over.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: There's something strange over there. Let's take a closer look.

Name: Ishmael
Text: Hmm? Over there... An "anomaly"?

Name: Ishmael
Text: We should take a break.

Name: Ishmael
Text: The "Four-Winged White Raven Interstellar History"... hmm... it's been a long time since I've opened this one.

Name: Ishmael
Text: Cannot be replicated, cannot be repeated...

Name: Ishmael
Text: Time is running out...

Name: Ishmael
Text: Life signs detected in the Four-Winged White Raven's space...? It's them...

Name: Vonnegut (Comms)
Text: The Hetero Tower's Gateway... Stay vigilant, Chaos.

Name: Vonnegut (Comms)
Text: This... might be traces left by another "civilization" in the Hetero Tower.

Name: Vonnegut (Comms)
Text: I'll wait for you in the center of this plaza.

Name: Chaos
Text: ...Yup.

Name: Chaos
Text: You shouldn't be here.

Name: Chaos
Text: Time... is reversing...

Name: Chaos
Text: The path has vanished, and the passage over there is abnormally sealed off. Is it... the Hetero-Creatures again?

Name: Chaos
Text: ...Data fragments? How did they end up here...

Name: Chaos
Text: The "Hourglass" is right here... Wait, those are traces of Hetero-Creatures...

Name: Chaos
Text: Get rid of these Hetero-Creatures, and we'll be able to enter the plaza through here.

Name: Chaos
Text: He's just up ahead.
<size=27><color=#FFFF00>>>[Core Component] acquired</color></size>

Name: Vonnegut
Text: You've arrived. The civilization this city belonged to must have been highly advanced. I saw interstellar navigation charts over there. Would such a "civilization" also be "reclaimed"?

Name: Vonnegut
Text: Did they just come through the "gate" after us?

Name: Chaos
Text: These... aren't languages from human civilization.

Name: Vera
Text: Before making a move, I need to assess the current situation. Let's hear what those guys over there have to say.

Name: Optimistic Refugee
Text: I've seen the old blueprints of the underground facility. There should be an elevator up ahead.

Name: Pessimistic Refugee
Text: Yeah, that elevator was still in use these past few years. It should help us escape...

Name: Pessimistic Refugee
Text: But that area is full of Corrupted, we can't stand against them.

Name: Optimistic Refugee
Text: But we're out of supplies. If we keep waiting, we'll just die a slow death. We might as well take our chances with those three Constructs.

Name: Pessimistic Refugee
Text: Geez, my eyelid keeps twitching... Is this really the right decision?

Name: Optimistic Refugee
Text: Left eye twitching means good fortune's coming our way. We're definitely going to succeed.

Name: Pessimistic Refugee
Text: But... it's my r-right eye that's twitching.

Name: Optimistic Refugee
Text: ...That's just a spasmodic contraction between the orbicularis oculi muscle and the facial nerve.

Name: Vera
Text: Tch, talk is useless compared to taking action. Hush and I are heading out now.

Name: Vera
Text: Let's go, Hush.

Name: Vera
Text: We need to split our team into two groups.

Name: Vera
Text: "Hummingbird" will take the other route. You'll need to follow me. Are you ready?

Name: Vera
Text: I really don't know whether to envy such optimism...

Name: Vera
Text: Heh, looks like whoever's waiting for us behind that door isn't the friendly type.

Name: Vera
Text: Can't avoid a fight, huh... Well then, let's see what they're made of!

Name: Hush's Drone
Text: I'll help too!

Name: Vera
Text: Phew, that was easy peasy. The elevator shaft is just ahead.

Name: Vera
Text: How are there more Corrupted? These annoying pests won't leave us alone!

Name: Vera
Text: The elevator looks undamaged from the outside. Let's try the control panel to see if we can get it working.

Name: Vera
Text: Good news, the circuits are still connected.

Name: Vera
Text: Wait, how are there Corrupted above the elevator too?!

Name: Captain
Text: [Comms] Captain: Prepare for demolition, or we'll all die down here!

Name: Hush's Drone
Text: Hush's Drone: Run! Quickly!

Name: Vera
Text: Vera: Tch, I wish I could...!

Name: Vera
Text: Vera: Tch, I wish I could...!
<size=27><color=#FF0000>>>SYSTEM WARNING<<\nFrame damage exceeds 30%\nImmediate repairs required</color></size>

Name: Hush's Drone
Text: Hush's Drone: Vera, are you alright? I was calling you, but you didn't respond...

Name: Vera
Text: Vera: That Corrupted has something on it?

Name: Vera
Text: Vera: I need to check it out...

Name: Vera
Text: ...A tracker? Why would it be on a Corrupted?

Name: Vera
Text: No! These Corrupted... someone deliberately led them here!

Name: Captain
Text: [Comms] Captain: We're detonating now, you need to pull b—

Name: Hush's Drone
Text: Hush: Ve-ra! Get away!

Name: Contemplative Refugee
Text: Could we escape through the sewers? I remember seeing that in an old movie...

Name: Vera
Text: The sewers are blocked at the end. Forget it. There's no salvation to be found there.

Name: Indecisive Brother
Text: I heard those Constructs are planning to break through with some people. Will that actually work?

Name: Indecisive Sister
Text: They look pretty capable in a fight. Let's trust them for now.

Name: Captain
Text: [Comms] Captain: Moth, Dog! Evacuate immediately!

Name: Captain
Text: [Comms] Captain: The Corrupted are going over!

Name: Captain
Text: [Comms] Captain: Prepare for demolition, or we'll all be trapped!

Name: Hush's Drone
Text: Hush's Drone: Run! Quickly!

Name: Vera
Text: Vera: Tch, I wish I could...!

Name: Hush's Drone
Text: Hush's Drone: Vera, are you alright?

Name: Hush's Drone
Text: Hush's Drone: I was calling you, but you didn't respond...

Name: Main Story of 3.2 & Big Affection After 2700

Text: <size=76><color=#e8f5ff>>>Let's Lose Ourselves Together</color></size>
<color=#e8f5ff>The Time-Stealing Puppet</color>

Name: Ayla
Text: Commandant, is it over there? There seems to be something on that platform.

Name: Ayla
Text: It's a Construct frame. Looks like that's our target. We need to find a way across.

Name: Ayla
Text: Who's there?! Commandant, watch out!
Line spacing: 0, confirmed.

Name: Ayla
Text: Who are you? How did you get in here?!

Name: Ayla
Text: There's an opening. Commandant, give me a hand!

Name: Ayla
Text: What?! No! Commandant! Commandant!!!

Name: Selena
Text: Conductor...

Name: Selena
Text: That prelude just now... Pretty sure Conductor has noticed that a few notes were missing.

Name: Selena
Text: I had a look at the piano. Three of the hammer mechanisms are missing from the inside, and there's a slip of note next to it.

Name: Selena
Text: "Come and find me. The treasure is in the oath of the loyal knight, on the bright spring's flower field, and among the talking and laughing when we enjoy the wine."

Name: Selena
Text: Must be an "Easter egg" by the WGAA... They always incorporate clever little games like this in their holographic simulations.

Name: Selena
Text: Since it's a game... Conductor, let's do this together.

Name: Selena
Text: I never thought I'd see this again in Babylonia... Conductor, could you help me preserve this moment forever?

Name: Selena
Text: Ah! It's the stage costume I used for my performances... The holographic simulation seems capable of making simple adjustments to fit my current frame. Should we... try it on?

Name: Selena
Text: Sigh... Wearing this costume again after so many years gives me such a familiar but strange feeling.

Name: Selena
Text: The Tempest, Turandot, The Gadfly... All the scripts here are from classic stage productions.

Name: Selena
Text: I'd love to perform these plays for you sometime, Conductor.

Name: Selena
Text: We haven't found all the hammer mechanisms yet. Let's follow the hints on the note and search around nearby.

Name: Selena
Text: "In the oath of the loyal knight"... So they replaced the sword with a hammer mechanism, huh?

Name: Selena
Text: I don't think there's anything else to dig up here, Conductor. Let's head down to the main hall and see what we can find there.

Name: Selena
Text: Conductor, may I lead you to the dance floor once more?

Name: Selena
Text: Just wanted to be sure... Great, this isn't a dream.

Name: Selena
Text: "On the bright spring's flower field"... Whoever wrote this is pretty imaginative. Pretty sure they could turn a dish of flowers into spring itself.

Name: Selena
Text: The bar should be the only place we haven't looked into.

Name: Selena
Text: That hint of purple is...

Name: Selena
Text: You must be tired from all this running around, Conductor. Why don't we sit down and rest for a bit?

Name: Selena
Text: Such a peaceful moment... I'm happy to share this space and my feelings with you.

Name: Selena
Text: Let's sit a little longer. I'd like to know more... about you, Conductor.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: After waking up in a hospital bed yet again, you discovered you'd been made a VIP guest at the Star of Life because of your frequent visits.

Name: Selena
Text: (Looking concerned)

Name: Selena
Text: Pfft...

Name: Selena
Text: Phew—

Name: Selena
Text: There's no need to regret it, Conductor, because... we've already found much more joy than we had back then.

Name: Selena
Text: As the saying goes... "If a story ends with fulfillment, then the mistakes and regrets along the way become nothing more than scenery worth admiring."

Name: Selena
Text: You have been invited to a confidential beta test for a holographic simulation game by WGAA but got reported for cheating because you scored too high.

Name: Selena
Text: I feel the same way... Conductor, these feelings of mine are as intense as fine wine, as radiant as the stars.

Name: Selena
Text: Just being by your side like this, together with you... I've already found a joy that nothing else in this world can compare to.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: You have been invited to a confidential beta test for a holographic simulation game by WGAA but got reported for cheating because you scored too high.

Name: Selena
Text: (Eyes filled with admiration)

Name: Selena
Text: Found the last piece to the puzzle... "Among the talking and laughing when we enjoy the wine."

Name: Selena
Text: Conductor, we can return to the concert hall to fix the piano now.

Name: Selena
Text: Well... Didn't think it'd be the practice piece I thought I had lost long ago.

Name: Selena
Text: It's amazing how things I thought I had completely forgotten could just pop up out of the blue one day, just like this.

Name: Selena
Text: It's amazing how even the aroma of food can be recreated with perfect precision in this holographic virtual space.

Name: Selena
Text: We've found all the hammers and the keys have been completely repaired. Would you like to hear a complete performance again, Conductor?

Name: Selena
Text: Well then... this time, I'd like to do it with you, Conductor.

Name: Selena
Text: Don't worry, I'll get you up to speed with some practice first. Just place your hands on the keys and trust me.

Name: 【kuroname】
Text: Good, let's begin.

Name: Selena
Text: Thank you for discovering it flourishing in that corner, Conductor.

Name: Jetavie
Text: After ID 3000: Jetavie Main Storyline

Name: Jetavie
Text: Hmm-hmm... Hmm-hmm-hmm...

Name: Jetavie
Text: ...Just as I expected.

Name: Jetavie
Text: I've still got some power left. A little exercise would be nice.

Name: Captain
Text: Enemies! Enemies!

Name: Captain
Text: Damn... Since when do teachers shoot that good?

Name: Captain
Text: Hmph...

Name: Mercenary A
Text: Weird... This road's supposed to be clear. Did something happen?

Name: Mercenary A
Text: Speaking of which, what you just pulled off was pretty impressive. Is everybody in Leibowitz this good?

Name: Mercenary A
Text: Hahahaha, I get it. You guys are all about secrets. I'll quit prying into your business.

Name: Mercenary A
Text: By the way, seems like there's a few more barricades up ahead. Would you mind helping us out?

Name: Mercenary A
Text: The situation's still unclear, so let's stick together and watch each other's backs. What do y'all say?

Name: Mercenary B
Text: Aren't we supposed to escort the teacher?

Name: Mercenary C
Text: Yeah, but it kinda feels like we're the ones getting escorted...

Name: Mercenary B
Text: Huh? I thought the company sent you?

Name: Mercenary C
Text: You idiot. The teacher's asking for your take on Leibowitz.

Name: Mercenary B
Text: Oh... That's what you meant! Well, you know, we're just some hired guns. Not with the authorities.

Name: Mercenary B
Text: We've been hired to escort those sent by the company... you know, people like you...

Name: Mercenary C
Text: Are you going to give a big speech? Just say something nice about the company...

Name: Captain
Text: So many barricades... How long has this place been deserted?

Name: Captain
Text: Corrupted! There's more?!

Name: Mercenary A
Text: No wonder we never got an alert. This detector's totally busted... Where's the tech guy?

Name: Mercenary B
Text: He cracked open some Golden Age wine and got too wasted in the conservation area to join us today...

Name: Mercenary A
Text: Alright, tell the others to head over.

Name: Jetavie
Text: Yawn... Gone already? Did you not notice me, or are you trying to play hard to get? Hehe... Well then, I guess we'll meet again a little later.

Name: Mercenary A
Text: Stay safe and make it quick.

Name: Jetavie
Text: Looking for me?

Name: Jetavie
Text: Try to keep up!

Name: Jetavie
Text: Hmph...

Name: Jetavie
Text: (Chuckles)

Name: Jetavie
Text: Well, I'll see you little later.

Name: Jetavie
Text: Hmm...? What's that sound?

Name: Jetavie
Text: You just don't give up, do you? Alright, let's make this quick. I've got places to be!

Name: Jetavie
Text: (Is there some clown trend spreading through the Corrupted? Everyone's got a red nose now.)

Name: Jetavie
Text: A data chip? Those mercs just dropped this? Tch, nothing useful at all.

Name: Jetavie
Text: Whoever put those red noses on the Corrupted... I should probably watch out for them.

Name: Jetavie
Text: All done! As expected of me!

Name: Jetavie
Text: Whoa...!

Name: Jetavie
Text: This is... a factory?

Name: Jetavie
Text: Enemies?

Name: Jetavie
Text: (They're saying... this is the control room, and that their boss is in the deepest section.)

Name: Jetavie
Text: Sort of. They're mechanoids, but corrupted by the Punishing Virus—I can only catch bits and pieces.

Name: Jetavie
Text: Alright, Corrupted. Time to rest in pieces!

Name: Jetavie
Text: Easy peasy! Let's look around for clues.

Name: Jetavie
Text: The factory's blueprint... That's enough to track down that clown.

Name: Jetavie
Text: Platform Lift Instructions? I'll hang onto these for now.

Name: Jetavie
Text: This is the access key? Ugh, looks hideous.

Name: Jetavie
Text: Alright, moving on to the next area.

Name: Gwynplaine
Text: Welcome to... Gwynplaine's playground! And this, my dear guest, is the exclusive VIP passage!

Name: Jetavie
Text: That damn old man... This is what he calls a passage? Surprised he hasn't broken his neck here yet.

Name: Jetavie
Text: A control panel... Does it need an access key? And I just picked up this red nose...

Name: Jetavie
Text: Tch. That's it?

Text: <color=#CFB53B>[Spinning Fire Orb]:</color> A fire orb circling around the character. It will deal damage to enemies who touch it. Level up to equip the character with more fire orbs.

Text: <color=#CFB53B>[Lightning Bolt]:</color> A lightning bolt that appears around the character at random intervals and deals damage to the enemy. Level up to increase the frequency and number of lightning bolts.

Text: <color=#999999>[ATK]:</color> Increases the character's ATK by half of the value of the add-on's level.

Name: Magic
Text: <color=#CFB53B>[Dark Snake]:</color> Use the Dark Snake to attack nearby enemies and deal Dark DMG. Level up to increase the attack frequency and the number of targets.

Name: Magic
Text: <color=#CFB53B>[Ice Path]:</color> Leaves an ice path while moving, dealing Ice DMG to enemies passing by. Level up to increase the Ice DMG.

Name: Item
Text: <color=#FF99CC>[Sweet Dumpling]:</color> Proudly made by Gray Raven. Restores 30 HP after use.

Name: Item
Text: <color=#FF99CC>[Blade]:</color> Allegedly the Forsaken Leader's knife. Very sharp. Makes the character deals 100% more damage for 30s. Obtain it multiple times to refresh the duration.

Name: Item
Text: <color=#FF99CC>[Crown]:</color> A crown with the ice queen's blessings. Creates an ice shield around the wearer to resist 10 damage for 30s. Obtain it multiple times to refresh the duration.

Name: Add-On Unit
Text: <color=#999999>[DEF]:</color> Increases the character's DEF by half of the value of the add-on's level.

Text: <color=#FF99CC>[Rocket Boots]:</color> Designed and made by the greatest goblin engineer Burp. These seemingly dangerous boots can double your speed for 30s. Obtain it multiple times to refresh the duration.

Text: <color=#999999>[Dodge]:</color> Increases the character's dodge charging attempts by one-third of the value the add-on's level.

Name: Item
Text: <color=#FF99CC>[Rose Clock]:</color> A delicate product by rose elf Roseline. Reduces the time the character spends to dodge for 30s. Obtain it multiple times to refresh the duration.

Name: Add-On Unit
Text: <color=#999999>[HP]:</color> Increases the character's Max HP by 10 points per level.

Text: <color=#FFCC99>[Bow and Arrow]:</color> Low firing rate. With piercing arrows.
